name: A Magic Pet Pony Horse World - Dress Up Your Cute Little Pony Free
name_original: A Magic Pet Pony Horse World - Dress Up Your Cute Little Pony Free
description:
Fun Pet Pony dress up and make over game.

Create your own wonderful pony with beautiful dress ups and amazing amount of items to choose from. There are so many different combinations.

Create your own unique pony by selecting items like:
Hair
Tail
Shoes
Necklace
Horn
Background
and more

Hours of fun and entertainment.

Download now for free!
